title: Twitter's Mass Resignations Test Elon Musk's Management Playbook
description: Mr. Musk has tried to frame demands for long hours of ’hardcore’ work at Twitter in altruistic terms but it isn’t clear that they are motivating employees.

title: Elon Musk Says Decision on Reinstating Trump Not Yet Made
description: The Twitter boss shared details of company’s speech policy and tweeted that some accounts would be reinstated.

title: FTX's Sam Bankman-Fried Cashed Out $300 Million During Funding Spree
description: Nearly three-quarters of the $420 million that FTX raised in a fundraising blitz last year went to founder Sam Bankman-Fried, who sold some of his personal stake in the company.

title: Amazon Looks to Sparrow to Carry Its Robotics Ambitions
description: The e-commerce giant plans to use the new robot and others to automate more of its warehouses during a period of companywide cost cutting.

title: FCC Publishes Map Showing Broadband Coverage Gaps
description: A new federal broadband map published Friday shows roughly 2% of American residential addresses lack access to broadband internet service.

title: Theranos Founder Elizabeth Holmes to Be Sentenced
description: Elizabeth Holmes, who was convicted on four counts of criminal fraud for deceiving investors, is scheduled to be sentenced. The judge who oversaw her criminal-fraud trial has broad legal discretion amid lawyer recommendations, precedent and other factors.

title: India Successfully Test Launches Its First Privately Developed Rocket
description: The event marks a step in the country’s push to develop a commercial space industry.

title: 9 Holiday Gear and Gadget Gifts for 2022 That Are (Actually) Built to Last
description: This holiday, you might need to check your giftees’ lists twice, but you’ll only need to buy any of these once.

title: Xi Stacks Government With Science, Tech Experts Amid U.S. Rivalry
description: The number of people with backgrounds in aerospace, artificial intelligence and other strategically important areas among the Chinese Communist Party elite has more than doubled to nearly 40%.

title: Indonesian Tech Giant GoTo Axes 1,300 Employees
description: The ride-hailing and e-commerce company joins global tech giants in cutting payroll.

title: Tim Draper Touts Decision to Pull Out of China
description: The Silicon Valley investor is looking toward Taiwan, while dismissing China’s Xi Jinping as a ‘weak leader’ for tightening controls on business.

title: Elizabeth Holmes Sentencing: A History of the WSJ Theranos Investigation
description: Holmes’s downfall was triggered by these Wall Street Journal articles about the blood-testing company and its founder.

title: FTX Didn't Name Names in Related-Party Transactions
description: The lack of detail in financial statements echoes past scandals including Enron.
